scripts.test:coverage:html: vitest run --coverage && echo 'HTML coverage report generated at: coverage/index.html'
scripts.test:coverage:open: pnpm run test:coverage && pnpm run coverage:show
scripts.test:coverage:verify: pnpm run test:coverage && pnpm run coverage:check
scripts.coverage:show: echo 'Coverage report generated at: file://'$(pwd)'/coverage/index.html' && if [ -n "$BROWSER" ]; then "$BROWSER" coverage/index.html; elif command -v xdg-open > /dev/null; then xdg-open coverage/index.html; elif command -v open > /dev/null; then open coverage/index.html; else echo 'Please open coverage/index.html in your browser'; fi
scripts.coverage:check: echo 'Checking coverage files...' && ls -la coverage/ && if [ -f 'coverage/lcov.info' ]; then echo 'âœ… LCOV file exists'; echo 'ðŸ“Š LCOV file size:' $(wc -l < coverage/lcov.info) 'lines'; else echo 'âŒ LCOV file missing'; exit 1; fi
scripts.lint:sonar: echo 'ðŸ“Š SonarQube analysis: Check VS Code Problems panel for issues'
scripts.lint:all: pnpm run lint && pnpm run lint:sonar
scripts.check-duplication: pnpm run check-duplication:production && pnpm run check-duplication:tests
scripts.check-duplication:all: pnpm run check-duplication:production && echo '\n=== Testing duplication in test files ===' && pnpm run check-duplication:tests
scripts.quality: prettier . --check && pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:coverage && pnpm run check-duplication && pnpm run lint:sonar
scripts.quality:full: pnpm run quality && echo 'âœ… Full quality check complete - Review VS Code Problems panel for SonarQube issues'
